languages.text: В прошлую встречу вы дали понять Ноктюрну Забвения, что не ищите союзника в его лице.
During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.
languages.original_text: В прошлую встречу вы дали понять Ноктюрну Забвения, что не ищите союзника в его лице.

traits.locale_text: During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.
During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.

During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.
During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.

languages.text: Lors de votre dernière rencontre avec le Nocturne de l'Oubli, vous lui avez clairement dit que vous ne cherchiez pas à vous en faire un allié.
languages.original_text: During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.

traits.locale_text: Lors de votre dernière rencontre avec le Nocturne de l'Oubli, vous lui avez clairement dit que vous ne cherchiez pas à vous en faire un allié.

languages.text: Durante tu último encuentro con Nocturno del Olvido, le dejaste bien claro que no lo querías como aliado.
languages.original_text: During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.

traits.locale_text: Durante tu último encuentro con Nocturno del Olvido, le dejaste bien claro que no lo querías como aliado.

languages.text: 忘却のノクターンとの最後の出会いで、彼を味方として望んでいないことをはっきりと伝えました。
languages.original_text: During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.

traits.locale_text: 忘却のノクターンとの最後の出会いで、彼を味方として望んでいないことをはっきりと伝えました。

languages.text: 在你最后一次见到遗忘夜曲时，你明确表示你不会把他当做你的盟友。
languages.original_text: During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.

traits.locale_text: 在你最后一次见到遗忘夜曲时，你明确表示你不会把他当做你的盟友。

languages.text: Während deiner letzten Begegnung mit Nocturne des Nichts hast du klargestellt, dass du ihn nicht zum Verbündeten willst.
languages.original_text: During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.

traits.locale_text: Während deiner letzten Begegnung mit Nocturne des Nichts hast du klargestellt, dass du ihn nicht zum Verbündeten willst.

languages.text: Nisyan Noktürnü ile son karşılaşmanızda, onunla ittifak kurmak istemediğini net bir şekilde belirttin.
languages.original_text: During your last encounter with Nocturne of Oblivion, you made it clear that you do not seek an ally in him.
